metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for software development teams

plugins.name: audit-trail
plugins.description: Logs every Claude Code tool call (input and output) to JSON files in ~/.claude/logs/ for auditability and debugging

plugins.name: notifications
plugins.description: System notifications when Claude completes tasks or needs your attention (macOS + Slack)

plugins.name: dev-workflow
plugins.description: Role-based development workflow subagents with pluggable PM and notes adapters
